name: Square Jump! - Runner Game.
description:
Hello friend, I present to you my game in which you have to be in the role of a cube that jumps on platforms, collecting dollars to buy new cubes, modes, items. Square jump! is a free arcade game created by one person. The game has easter eggs and features that will come in handy during the passage. To start the game, you just need to download the game and press the "Play" button in the game itself. By clicking on the screen your cube will jump, your target is the next platform. And remember - DO NOT TOUCH THE EARTH, or you will lose.

There are also bonus objects in the game such as: Halo - gives immortality, Magnet - attracts money, x2 - the money caught during the bonus is multiplied by 2.
